CraftImprovement.Name: Practice Makes Perfect
CraftImprovement.Description: Character learns something valuable and gains [BO] on next check with same skill.

CraftImprovement.Name: Lightweight
CraftImprovement.Description: Reduce encumbrance by 1.

CraftImprovement.Name: Sealable
CraftImprovement.Description: Armor can take the Vacuum Sealed attachment.

CraftImprovement.Name: Lessons Learned
CraftImprovement.Description: Reduce difficulty of next crafting check by 1.

CraftImprovement.Name: Extra Melee Defense
CraftImprovement.Description: Add +1 melee defense to armor.

CraftImprovement.Name: Special Embellishment
CraftImprovement.Description: Add automatic [AD] to a chosen skill.

CraftImprovement.Name: Efficient Construction
CraftImprovement.Description: Retain supplies worth 50% of teh Material Price.

CraftImprovement.Name: Extra Ranged Defense
CraftImprovement.Description: Add +1 ranged defense to armor.

CraftImprovement.Name: Extra Hard Point
CraftImprovement.Description: Add 1 hard point to armor.

CraftImprovement.Name: Extra Soak
CraftImprovement.Description: Add +11 soak to armor.

CraftImprovement.Name: Duplicate
CraftImprovement.Description: Create one additional, identical set of armor at no cost.

CraftImprovement.Name: Armor Schematic
CraftImprovement.Description: Permanently reduce difficulty of checks to create armor using this template by 1.

CraftImprovement.Name: Integral Attachment
CraftImprovement.Description: Add +1 hard point to armor, then install one applicable armor attachment that requires 1 hard point.

CraftImprovement.Name: Exhausting Effort
CraftImprovement.Description: Suffer 3 strain when finished with construction.

CraftImprovement.Name: Heavy
CraftImprovement.Description: Increase encumbrance by 1.

CraftImprovement.Name: Poor Fit
CraftImprovement.Description: Donning and doffing this armor requires one additional action

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Poor Fit[b]: Donning and doffing this armor requires one additional action.

CraftImprovement.Name: Complex
CraftImprovement.Description: The armor is difficult to repair. Increase difficulty of checks to repair armor by {0}.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Complex[b]: Increase difficulty of checks to repair this armor by 1.

CraftImprovement.Name: Difficult to Customize
CraftImprovement.Description: Increase the difficulty of checks to modify attachments on this armor by 1.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Difficult to Customize[b]: Increase the difficulty of checks to modify attachments on this armor by {0}.

CraftImprovement.Name: Restrictive
CraftImprovement.Description: Wearer adds automatic [TH] to {1} checks.

CraftImprovement.Name: Wear and Tear
CraftImprovement.Description: The tools used to make this armor are damaged 1 step.

CraftImprovement.Name: Fragile
CraftImprovement.Description: Whenever armor becomes damaged, the damage always counts as moderate unless it would be worse.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Fragile[b]: Whenever armor becomes damaged, the damage always counts as moderate unless it would be worse.

CraftImprovement.Name: Expensive
CraftImprovement.Description: Whenever armor becomes damaged, the cost to repair is doubled.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Expensive[b]: Whenever armor becomes damaged, the cost to repair is doubled.

CraftImprovement.Name: Supply Shortage
CraftImprovement.Description: Cannot finish until more supplies are acquired costing 25% of Material Price.

CraftImprovement.Name: Unexpected Flaw
CraftImprovement.Description: GM may spend 1 Destiny point to cause armor to fail and suffer major damage. This can be exploited only once.
